item.title: Docker
item.author: celine
item.description: Docker Note docker ps ​ list running containers docker stop <container_id> ​ stops the container docker start <container_id> ​ starts stopped container docker ps -a ​ lists running and stopped container docker run <image_name>: ​ pulls image and starts container ​ (docker pull + docker start in one command) [CONTAINER Port vs HOST Port] + Multiple containers can run on your host machine + Your laptop has only certain ports available
